testcase.name: initializationError

error.message: Invalid test class 'org.example.ArkanoidGameTest': 1. The class org.example.ArkanoidGameTest is not public. 2. Test class should have exactly one public constructor 3. Method testBallInitialPositionAndSpeed() should be public 4. Method testBallBouncesCorrectly() should be public 5. Method testBricksRequireCorrectHitsToBreak() should be public 6. Method testBricksAndPaddleSize() should be public 7. Method testBoardSize() should be public 8. Method testInitialBrickPlacement() should be public 9. Method testBrickPatternGeneratedRandomly() should be public 10. Method testLifeLostWhenBallFalls() should be public 11. Method testPaddleResetsPositionAtStart() should be public 12. Method testPaddleMovementWithinBounds() should be public 13. Method testLevelRestartsWhenLifeIsLost() should be public 14. Method testGameHas33Levels() should be public 15. Method testBrickSizes() should be public 16. Method testBrickColors() should be public 17. Method testGameResetsWhenPlayerChoosesToRestart() should be public 18. Method testBricksIncreaseEachLevel() should be public 19. Method testPlayerStartsWithThreeLives() should be public 20. Method testBreakAllBricksToCompleteLevel() should be public 21. Method testBallSpeedIncreasesEachLevel() should be public
